stork.core.net

Class StorkInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.core.net.StorkInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTCPInterface, HTTPInterface

    public abstract class StorkInterface
extends Object
    An interface which awaits incoming client requests and passes them on to the server.

      StorkInterface(Server server)
      Create a StorkInterface for the given server.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static StorkInterface create(Server server,
                    URI uri)
        Automatically create an interface from a URI.
        Parameters:
        server - the server to provide an interface for.
        uri - the URI specifying the interface to listen on.
        Returns:
        A StorkInterface listening for connection at endpoint specified by uri.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if an interface could not be created based on the URI.

      • name

        public abstract String name()
        Get the name of this interface. This is used for logging purposes.
